briefTitle: Study to Evaluate the Immunogenicity and Safety of an Investigational Influenza Vaccine (H1N1) in Children
officialTitle: Safety and Immunogenicity Study of GSK Biologicals' Pandemic Influenza Candidate Vaccine (GSK2340272A) in Children Aged 3 to 17 Years
summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the immunogenicity and safety of GSK Biologicals' investigational vaccine GSK2340272A in children aged between 3 and 17 years.

primaryOutcome.measure: Humoral Immune Response in Terms of Haemagglutination Inhibition (HI) Antibody Titers Against the Flu A/California/7/2009 (H1N1) Vaccine Strain
